website_summaries.verdict: This case is a great bet for laptop owners who are a tad accident-prone.  Offers superior durability and protection from bumps and scratches.
pros: Shell is transparent, allowing owners to customize with photos or other art
Features simple clip-on design with full access to ports and functions
Easy to grip with rubberized surface and slip-resistant rubber feet
cons: Not for people who want a colorful case

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, somewhat fragile
customer_reviews.text: This case for the Macbook pro was one of the nicer looking ones on the market. Its not too bulky, and still shows the aesthetics the of the Macbook. That being said it scratches fairly easy, and is hard to take off. In addition I've noticed some cracks along the edges of the case. I've never dropped or had any pressure placed on my Macbook. Also the lid portion of the cover is not very secure from the corners, which allows dust to get trapped within the case. Love the design, but its not worth $50 - $60 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Don't drink and Prime

customer_reviews.title: Does Its Job, Good Quality, Sticker-Test Approved
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cases I've had on my Mac. It definitely does its job to protect your computer. As someone who occasionally drops their backpack a little harder onto the ground, this case has been a good protecter. I like the clear aspect a lot. It's nice to put Polaroid photos on the inner side of the case and stickers come off very easier from the case and doesn't leave residue! The only downside is that the top portion is a little heavy and, if you're like me, and lounge in different positions, sometimes the screen will lean back.
customer_reviews.author: College Student

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my case!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to keep my Mac book air sea after I had a bit of an incident with the screen and had to replace the screen. I did some research on this case and it turned out to be just as amazing as the reviews were, it definitely protects my computer and the best part about it is it was really easy to actually put on my computer. I was a little bit apprehensive when I got the package in, thinking that it would be complicated to put on my computer correctly. It actually wasn't, super easy to put on! No issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome MacBook Case!
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best case for the MacBook! It doesn't add much weight to the book and the Macs Apple logo shines brightly through the transparent part of the case. The case is a tough polycarbonate finish and the inside of the case is smooth so it shouldn't scratch the MacBooks aluminium finish. Not drop tested it yet, hope I never need to... But I'm sure it offers as much protection as many others, if not more. Ordered this for delivery to the UK, because Amazon UK don't seem to sell it... Come on Amazon UK get stocking it!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for my MacBook Pro!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of reasons I like it: 1. lightweight 2. Thin 3. mostly clear 4. Good impact protection. My only complaint is that one of the tabs broke in the first couple of days. However, the case has continued to function well. Addendum: this case lasted me 2 1/2 years. It slowly lost tabs but continued to protect my MacBook Pro. I am pleased with 2 1/2 years of good service! Lots of people don’t keep a laptop this long, but I plan to keep using it as long as it performs well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Otero

customer_reviews.title: Best case to Protect a Mac Book Air
customer_reviews.text: The case provides very good protection for the Mac Book Air. I have nerve damage in one hand and the texture of the case has prevented me from dropping the device several times. I did have some issues at first to get all the clips to snap in place. But once snapped in place the case stays on the Mac very well. The reports I have read state this case provides the best protection for themas Book air. I believe it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Morey

customer_reviews.title: This case is a JOKE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for a 15 inch Mac Book Pro Retina 2013. Seems like a good case until you put it on the laptop. Cant open the screen pass 87 degrees with the case on. Total joke of a case, what happened at the R&D department at STM???!!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's see through and not visibly distracting and ...
customer_reviews.text: My Mac Book is so thin and light I dropped it twice getting it out of my bag. This case is a lifesaver. It adds just enough weight and body to help me keep my grip. I like that it's see through and not visibly distracting and the black plastic frame absorbs shocks and keeps my corners safe.
customer_reviews.author: Y2Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: tabs broke 1 year later
customer_reviews.text: Tabs broke after less than one year. I had a 17" with a speck cover - lasted 4 years. This has nice bumpers and feels durable and well made - aside from the broken tabs that hold it in place. No heavy abuse - opened laptop when case was mis aligned and snapped the tabs much too easily. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning of using it, I loved it! Looked great and felt great! But the case doesn't fit snug. The plastic part of it was warped. The plastic that holds the laptop isn't that strong. I have had many of the little plastic parts snap off and now it is just annoying to have. I am getting a different case! Looks great, but I would rather have a case that isn't falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Fraire

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very indecisive about making decisions, but I knew I had to get a good case for my brand new Gold Macbook 12” Retina Display. I’m prone to dropping things as well as my phone which guided my decision to get a somewhat rugged case for my MacBook. This one is PERFECT because it’s not to manly, it’s sleek and comfortable to hold. The rubber/plastic outside also allows you to grip your MacBook. Super early installation, I would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The case scratches far to easily. I do not need something to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: The case scratches far to easily. I do not need something to be a cage for my laptop, I just wanted something that would prevent against minor damage. But this case is far to easily damaged by the smallest scratch; a plastic belt buckle in my backpack has done a lot of damage sadly.
customer_reviews.author: David Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I can actually get it on and off my laptop without it breaking like my speck case did and this case is cheaper ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely case. I can actually get it on and off my laptop without it breaking like my speck case did and this case is cheaper than those are. It has nice thick corner pieces on the back bottom that I don't fear will break when the laptop is put into a backpack on its side and it doesn't hinder the laptop opening.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good protection if traveling abroad
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good if you are working in an environment where there is a lot hustle and bustle, and a high probability that you might bump your Mac book against something. The only downside is that it does slightly mark the laptop a little. Been using for 2+years
customer_reviews.author: Bao Bao

customer_reviews.title: I love that it is partly clear and I could put ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple different cases for my MacBook Pro and haven’t really cared for the cases. This one is different! I love that it is partly clear and I could put pictures behind it. Sleek design and look! Not bulky with a lot of protection!
customer_reviews.author: DoodleBop

customer_reviews.title: If you decide to remove it, the tabs holding it on the MacBook break apart.
customer_reviews.text: I applied a D-Brand skin to my MacBook and wanted something to protect it. I ordered this as a means to do that! It is worth the money especially if you want your photos, stickers or like me skin protected for the long term.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Bottom piece does not fit well. So much wiggle room and play. Super annoying. Need to work on fit and finish. Top part perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Louology

customer_reviews.title: I had a $50 case before that felt really flimsy ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a $50 case before that felt really flimsy, this however was really solid. I think it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: King of the World

customer_reviews.title: Static!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice case but it's causing static shocks almost every time I grab my computer. Not ok for a computer to get shocked in any manor. Not sure if it needs to go back yet. It is definitely not safe for the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: OOPS
customer_reviews.text: Very good case, but it had to be returned ... we made a MacBooBoo and ordered the wrong one. Always double check the model especially if it's for your grand daughter. Sorry about that!
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Luhning

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. My wife was very pleased and feels her MacBook Air is well protected.
customer_reviews.author: MWCraft

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It was a good choice for my high school grandson!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Once the case was applied correctly it was awesome! You can see the Apple logo and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The clear case was a little tricky to secure. There was also some clicking when the laptop was opened. Once the case was applied correctly it was awesome! You can see the Apple logo and the stickers underneath perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for clear color, decent, a little overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad case, seems relatively high quality. One of the better options for a clear color, so if that factor is important to you, this is a good purchase. Otherwise, you can likely find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Turetsky

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed with the cover of the case because two of ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this case on my computer back in January. I spent the extra money for a protective case, considering the cost of my mac. I am disappointed with the cover of the case because two of the plastic hinges that keep it in place have snapped. I am concerned it is not upholding well. I am going to try to return it. I would not buy this kind again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy attractive case
customer_reviews.text: Great case! Slightly bulkier than I thought but I like how much protection it provides my laptop. Also looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Doesn't detract from the computer at all and have stickers all over and still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: kristen reinken

customer_reviews.title: Increases weight
customer_reviews.text: I have same product/brand for my iPad. It increases the overall weight slightly, but very secure & I love the clear back.
customer_reviews.author: Firecrackerrr3

customer_reviews.title: good protection and a nice clean
customer_reviews.text: Simple yet tough, good protection and a nice clean look
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: Plastic top lid chipped and doesn't work as intended.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic chipped on the top lid of the case and now the case falls of the top and will not snap securely. It did not last long enough to warrant the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Karli Tedeschi

customer_reviews.title: This case is great although on my 11inch macbook the heaviness makes my ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is great although on my 11inch macbook the heaviness makes my screen tip back (this only happens when I have the computer on my lap and not on a table) - otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Moira Pirsch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I used this to take my laptop on a month long trip overseas and it was great. No fussing with a case and zippers, just full time protection.
customer_reviews.author: Phesant Farm

customer_reviews.title: It sucks. Other than that
customer_reviews.text: The cover has a design problem because I have trouble opening my macbook completely. The top cover will stuck withe the bottom cover. It sucks. Other than that, the material is really good. Looks awesome but useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Zhaolong C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Great aesthetic! I have a gold MacBook and the contrast is great. Very sturdy. Once it’s on it’s not coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly, but be aware that it’s heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly, but be aware that it’s heavy. Your MacBook Air monitor will only be able to stand in two positions: straight up and all the way back.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrad Tackett

customer_reviews.title: It "fits" my laptop but it certainly isn't functional seeing ...
customer_reviews.text: It "fits" my laptop but it certainly isn't functional seeing how every single time I go to use my computer, I can not open it more than a 45 degree angle or the case buckles together and pops itself off.... I will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: great case! fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: great case! fits nicely, solid. Have not dropped the computer yet so I cant say that how it will hold up or protect but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: PDL

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing I've tried compares to this case's design. It is sturdy, easy to grip, and not bulky
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up...notice the duct tape?
customer_reviews.text: I bit the bullet and bought this lap top cover thinking it would last. It only lasted about 4 months before the tabs started breaking. It was definitely NOT worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Neill

customer_reviews.title: Not so Rugged
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the job just thought for the price I was going to get more than plastic
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: yet sturdy. Can't wait to put my pictures in between ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and light, yet sturdy. Can't wait to put my pictures in between for a customization! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: dquick

customer_reviews.title: FRAGILE DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: the tabs that hold the cover are very fragile....they broke very easy...DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Milam

customer_reviews.title: Pays to spend a little more for a great fitting case.
customer_reviews.text: This thing fits so much better than the cheap one I used for a while.
customer_reviews.author: DrT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, practical, fits well. Does weigh more and that pulls screen fully back easily. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Moombeams

customer_reviews.title: These are nice cases. I put a favorite photo inside the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice cases. I put a favorite photo inside the clear cover which personalized the case as well as provided a less sterile appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's alright. The feet are textured but arent really ...
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. The feet are textured but arent really rubberized so it would still slip around. One of the tabs didnt really click onto my laptop but its not too big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and protection wish the top part would ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and protection wish the top part would wrap around the edges a bit more but dont know if its possible due to the desgin, either way i like it alot...protects my investement without ruinig the look
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Durable and lightweight. Case unfastens slightly when laptop screen is in upright position
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this one is holding up quite nicely.
customer_reviews.text: This does add bulk to the air. It also makes it so that the lid is a little heavy and may tilt back an additional 2 degrees depending on where you tilt it. However, those are small prices to pay for the protection afforded by the case. Unlike many cases that crack, this one is holding up quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 3 months ago. The reason I am not giving it 5 stars is because a clip on the bottom of the laptop had broken, making it impossible to hold onto the laptop any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Cracked within 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Have literally had this for 3 days today, my Mac has not left my apartment and I keep it in a drawer, yet this case already cracked. I hate to see how it holds up in the real world.
customer_reviews.author: BleuCatQueen

customer_reviews.title: Good product with room for improvement!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. I would give this a 5 overall if it wasn't for the fact I had to have the company send me out a replacement for it. The clips that hold it to the computer are very thin and are prone to breaking. I will say on the flip side the company is amazing. I sent them an email about the defective clips and they got back in contact with me very quickly. I had a replacement within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Haberern

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: The Speck case I had been using for my macbook broke recently, and I bought this case to replace it. It's a bit bulkier than the cases Speck uses, but nothing unmanageable. I feel confident that it'll protect against scrapes and minor bumps, but I don't think it'll do much for a major fall. It was easy to put on, it just clips in place - but I can already tell it'll be an absolute nightmare to try and get off. The case didn't come with any instructions, either, which I'm sure will prove to be problematic in a year or two when I go to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: hmm

customer_reviews.title: Great case, it is super protective and keeps all ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case, it is super protective and keeps all dirt, dings, and scratches off the mac. The only annoyance, is the case kinda prevents the fan from running super effectively, so if your playing graphically intense games (Steam) or watching video in 4K, it may get a little noisy. The perfect fix for this is just to put any old book under the computer and that completely fixes the problem. I am keeping the case, it is way better than any of those cheap plastic cases you can get.
customer_reviews.author: bk-is-the-name

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best cases I've used for a Mac
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cases I've used for a Mac. I've got 3 Mac laptops, and each one has an STM Dux case on it - they are slim, light weight, strong and see-through. Apple makes a fine looking product, so why not show it off? The case fits snugly and easily, and there are feet on the bottom part of the case so that the computer stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C Stratos

customer_reviews.title: If it's good enough for them I thought it would be for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the case for my MacBook Air. My son's school bought these for all the Mac laptops the kids use. If it's good enough for them I thought it would be for me also. It seems to do a good job protecting it as I see my sons is mared up from use. I would give it 5 stars but I feel there is always room for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great case. The only thing that bothered me is ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great case. The only thing that bothered me is that it is thin with not so much protection.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking cover it protect the outside the pc but it could improve the clip-on.
customer_reviews.author: Vincemalan

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a bad cut on the finger when taking it off as ...
customer_reviews.text: Badly made. Gave me a bad cut on the finger when taking it off as the edges are barely finished. The fit is poor and the top and bottom pieces often hit against each other when opening and closing the macbook. Surprisingly low quality for something in this price range. Definitely look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: If you looking to protect your mac look for something else! Bad product, bad customer service.
customer_reviews.author: i love amazon

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Computer Case
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite computer case so far. I'm able to see the stickers on my computer. The sides do tend to break but they have a really good warranty policy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The WORST product I have EVER purchased on Amazon !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my new 2019 13" MacBook Air. I was so excited to see it had arrived. I opened it up and went to installed it. It's just 2 pieces of plastic. No clips, no nothing. Doesn't even fit around my computer. Flimsy junk. Didn't even snap together. Nothing for it to snap into. I googled their customer service number since they don't put one on their invoice RED FLAG. There isn't one on Google either! DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: James L. Ewing

product_meta.title: STM Dux Rugged case for MacBook Air 13 Inch black for 2015 2017 models only
product_meta.description: Size:MacBook Air 13-Inch| Color:BlackDesigned in Australia, the Dux fitted case provides best-in-class protection for your MacBook Air 11 or MacBook Air 13. The super protective polycarbonate and rubberized TPU bracket prevents scratches and dings for even the most accident prone among US. The Dux sports a unique transparent cover allowing you to customize your laptop with photos, stickers etc. , or just let the pristine device to shine through. All ports are accessible with a ergonomic and form fitting design for a comfortable carry. Textured rubber feet prevent your laptop from sliding on smooth surfaces. The open hinge design facilitates heat transfer so your MacBook Air can cool itself freely. Simple and audible "click" Installation makes for an easy on or off.
feature_bullets: Super protective polycarbonate and rubberized TPU bracket for even the most accident prone among us
Transparent cover to customize your MacBook Air or allow your pristine device to shine through
Ergonomic and form fitting design for a comfortable carry and access to all ports
Textured rubber feet prevent your laptop from sliding on smooth surfaces
Open hinge allows your MacBook Air to breathe and cool itself freely
Simple installation with locking clip-on design. Compatible with 13 inch MacBook Air. Model Number(s)-A1466

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars152 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
